formData.point1: The Petitioners /Accused case is posted today.
formData.point2: The Petitioners/Accused could not able to attend the Hon'ble Court today A2 got leg injury and A3 due his illness.
formData.point3: The Petitioners will be regular in all upcoming hearings.
formData.point4: This absence is neither wanton nor willful.
formData.prayer: to condone the absence of the petitioner/accused and to proceed the case with that of his counsel
